scripts.eslint:fix: eslint '**/*' --fix && yarn workspaces foreach --interlaced --parallel --topological-dev --verbose run eslint:fix
scripts.prepack: yarn workspaces foreach --all --interlaced --jobs unlimited --parallel --topological-dev --verbose run prepack
scripts.prepublish: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names eslint,jest,prepublish,test "yarn run eslint" "yarn run jest" "yarn workspaces foreach --all --jobs unlimited --parallel --verbose run prepublish" "yarn run test"
scripts.publish: yarn workspaces foreach --interlaced --jobs unlimited --no-private --parallel --topological-dev --verbose npm publish --tolerate-republish
scripts.up: yarn up "@*/*" "!(@monorepo-template/test|@monorepo-template/tree-logger|aws-rum-react|fullstory-react|lazy-i18n|mock-next-router|number-format-react|react-datadog|sentry-react|unknown2string|use-awsui-table-item-description|use-next-awsui|use-offline|use-shallow-memo)" && yarn up --recursive "@*/*" "*" && yarn sdks vscode
